images.caption: Figure 1:Average proof scores on CNML-level problems by category and model, as evaluated by our verifier.
Figure 2:Proof quality improvements as the maximum sequential iterations varies from 1 (no refinement) to 8 (initial generation plus up to 7 refinements based on self verification).

Figure 3:Expert evaluation results on the Basic and Advanced subsets of IMO-ProofBench. All results are sourced fromimobench, with the exception of DeepSeekMath-V2, which was evaluated by our experts following the grading guidelines.
